channel.title: Getting Data from Other Services on FEWD
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Data from Other Services on FEWD

item.title: iTunes Search API
item.description: Demo Application Summary This application uses the iTunes API to display a list of songs/albums associated with artist submitted into the search field download iTunes Search Application

item.title: Giphy Search API
item.description: Demo Application Summary This application uses the Giphy API to display a list of gifs associated with a search term submitted into the search field download Giphy Search Application Setup Instructions Sign up for a Giphy Developer account Download the demo application and save files in your class folder Add your Access Token to app.js on line 31 Run a Local Server on your computer (Required!
